value.title: MODEX 2022: Let the Cobots Handle Repetitive Labor
value.excerpt: Universal Robots will showcase how its latest robotics platforms are applied in real-world applications at MODEX 2022, which takes place in Atlanta, Ga. (April 28-3). Engineers will be able to see how cobots automate palletizing and piece-picking tasks.

value.title: Space Hardware Club team’s robotic rover on its way to summertime competition in Utah
value.excerpt: After two years of work, a four-function robotic rover developed for use on Mars by a 21-person Space Hardware Club (SHC) team at UAH, will be in summer competition at the University Rover Challenge (URC) finals in the desert of southern Utah.

value.title: Robotic Abela enjoys upper hand as Grech adopts combative mode in first TV debate

value.title: Handheld robot uses AI to help first responders stem bleeding
value.excerpt: Researchers at MIT's Lincoln Laboratory have developed a handheld robot that can help minimally trained responders to control severe internal bleeding in victims of traumatic injury, by helping them insert a needle and catheter into a major blood vessel.

value.title: What happened to delivery robots in San Francisco?
value.excerpt: After a number of companies launched delivery robots in 2017, the city has cracked down on the emerging tech, making it difficult to operate on city streets.

value.title: Developing an autonomous robotic platform to improve the quality of sleep

value.title: Chipotle Tests Chippy: An AI Kitchen Assistant From Miso Robotics
value.excerpt: Chipotle Mexican Grill has revealed a new autonomous kitchen assistant that makes tortilla chips. The unit, dubbed Chippy, was developed in collaboration with Miso Robotics, whose Flippy robots have seen deployments in several White Castle restaurants.
